Title: Grants a right of action where registration fees are imposed on mortgagors in default
Summary: Grants a right of action where registration fees of residential mortgages in default are imposed on the mortgagor; increases fee amount authorized to be imposed on mortgagees or their agents.
LawSection: Real Property Actions and Proceedings Law
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property actions and proceedings law, in relation to a right of action where registration fees are imposed on mortgagees in default
